channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee -- Web Gateway(MWG)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee -- Web Gateway(MWG)

item.title: CVE-2019-3638|2024-08-04T19:12:09.685Z -- mcafee -- web%20gateway%28mwg%29
item.description: Reflected Cross Site Scripting vulnerability in Administrators web console in McAfee Web Gateway (MWG) 7.8.x prior to 7.8.2.13 allows remote attackers to collect sensitive information or execute commands with the MWG administrator's credentials via tricking the administrator to click on a carefully constructed malicious link.
